channel.title: MidwestWeekends - Travel in Minnesota, Wisconsin, Illinois, Iowa
channel.description: Up-to-date information on travel in the Upper Midwest

item.title: In the land of Norwegians
item.description: Old World traditions come with a wink in the bluff-country burg of Spring Grove.

item.title: Still fighting the Civil War
item.description: Across the Upper Midwest, Civil War battle reenactments turn history into flesh and blood.

item.title: Blasts from the past
item.description: Every September, the Civil War comes to an old stagecoach inn in eastern Wisconsin.

item.title: Trekking the Superior Hiking Trail
item.description: You can backpack, day hike, stay in lodges or go with a group on Minnesota's premier path.

item.title: True brew in the Twin Cities
item.description: Craft breweries are popping up all over the Twin Cities, offering tours, tap rooms and live music.

item.title: Great grape stomps
item.description: At winery harvest festivals, compete with your feet.

item.title: Toasting Oktoberfest
item.description: These festive tributes to Bavarian tradition put the oompah into fall.
